TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed VisualizerScalingMode extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Audiofx.VisualizerScalingMode AsPlayed = int32(1)

summary.para: Defines a capture mode where the playback volume will affect (scale) the range of the captured data. A low playback volume will lead to low sample and fft values, and vice-versa.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Audiofx.VisualizerScalingMode Normalized = int32(0)

summary.para: Defines a capture mode where amplification is applied based on the content of the captured data. This is the default Visualizer mode, and is suitable for music visualization.
